summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 7%).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles) and dew point temperature (up 2.9°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 260.8m higher than yesterday, 297.0m higher than past week, 373.2m higher than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 332m minimum and 1648m maximum, with an average of 1251.8m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 954.8m and 878.6m.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; intensely hot, uncomfortable in direct sunlight. Also, pleasant humidity levels and some wind, breezy at times. Possible light showers, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and sunlight levels will peak at very high intensity. Weather patterns to stay the same.
